website_summaries.verdict: A baby-approved, satisfying oatmeal that is not only organic, but made by one of the most popular brands in baby products.
pros: USDA certified organic and non-GMO oatmeal cereal
Trusted, popular brand in baby food
Can be purchased in singles or multi-packs
Earns thumbs up from parents who say babies like it
cons: The spout is wide and can cause spills if not poured carefully

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, convenient, and my baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby's breakfast. Good quality, quick, and convenient. My baby loves it. When he was ready to try solids, we started with this at around 6 months - first with breast milk, and now that he's over 1, with regular milk. Never had any issues with expiration or quality. We went through the 6 pack in about 1-1.5 months initially. Now that he is eating more solids, we don't go through it as quick but it is definitely one of our pantry staples.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No difference between the non organic one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I ran out of the non organic Gerber oatmeal. I really cant tell the difference between the two. The non organic one was so much cheaper too. Sometimes slick deal will tell you when there is a deal on the non organic one on amazon. I would say go with the non organic Gerber oatmeal when there is a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shananigans

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but neither child would eat it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in 2017. So if it has been reformulated since, ignore my review. Both my children have HATED it. Tried mixing it with many things (formula, breast milk, whole milk, yogurt)... At best they choked it down after much coercion. I once tasted some mixed with formula as recommended. I have a pretty tolerant sense of taste, but I gagged on this stuff... Anyway, it is certainly convenient in how easily it stores and mixes... But that doesn't mean much if your kids hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it-- baby's breakfast for past 6-7 months!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this to my baby since shortly after starting her on solids (around 6-7 mo). She's now 14 months, and I still like to feed her this cereal in the morning -- primarily for the iron and fiber. I even mix her vitamin D drops in there :D I'll sometimes mix puree with it, to give a variety and different nutrients, but baby loves it with just water :)
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent first food for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I began sprinkling a little off this in my baby's bottles at 4 months to help him sleep through the night. It's excellent to mix baby food with as you introduce new foods. A must have for new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cline

customer_reviews.title: Organic
customer_reviews.text: I like this product! it does great thickening up my granddaughters baby food. I also had put it in her formula to make her not get so hungry in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: My sons breakfast staple
customer_reviews.text: My son has been eating Gerber oatmeal for breakfast since he was 6 months old. It is a great source of iron, easy to make, and easy to add all sorts of mix-ins into!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We started with rice, but baby had constipation issues. It got much smoother after switching to this. It is also a good iron source.
customer_reviews.author: Steven T.

customer_reviews.title: Stale cereal
customer_reviews.text: Got a six pack of cereal with expiration of only 1.5 months away. And the first box I opened smells stale. So I have 4 months supply that I will have to throw out.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: PLEASEMETAL FOUND IN GERBER ORGANIC OATMEAL
customer_reviews.text: So disturbing I see black stuff settled at the bottom of my child’s bottle that was containing ONLY breast milk and the Gerber “ORGANIC” oatmeal! I put a magnet up to it and it moved around! I thought I was loosing it when I saw this!! PLEASE MOMS BESAFE!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Not as sweet as the non-organic oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: I try everything before I give anything to my baby. This one taste not as sweet as the non-organic one that is also made from Gerber.
customer_reviews.author: CloHe

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product for infants
customer_reviews.text: A staple at our lunch / dinner table for both of our children, while they were 6 months - 12 months old
customer_reviews.author: Lolo18

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tasted it too and it taste pretty good. It’s cheaper on here by a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old daughter loves this oatmeal. I’ve tasted it too and it taste pretty good. It’s cheaper on here by a couple cents than in stores.
customer_reviews.author: er1gurl

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase from this seller, expired☹️
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase from this seller, the baby food I purchased expires in two weeks ☹️ So six tubs of oat cereal that expire in two weeks, what a scam, I wish they had a negative star rating because these guys don't deserve one star.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: For milk
customer_reviews.text: It was great. I use it in my baby's milk.
customer_reviews.author: Oshun

customer_reviews.title: Near expiration
customer_reviews.text: Great price...but I received my product February 7th 2020, and I checked the expiration date on all 6 of the packages and it is March 18th 2020. There is no way I will be able to use all 6 of them by the expiration date so I would definitely not recommend this unless you have many, many children.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 months old and I started giving her solids. She just loves her oatmeal in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: WallieDollie

customer_reviews.title: 6 containers delivered 1 week before expiration date!!!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great, our baby loves it! But 6 containers delivered 1 week before expiration date??? Our baby was able to try it for 2-days and the rest went to trash because all the containers expired. That was a waste of money, never buying anything from Gerber again!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amro

customer_reviews.title: Rough texture
customer_reviews.text: Texture is a little rough. If it is smoother, it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: decent product - but has wheat.
customer_reviews.text: This contains wheat if your child is allergic keep him away from this, if not it is organic and non-gmo!
customer_reviews.author: NPK

customer_reviews.title: Great Cereal at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: We like oatmeal rather than rice cereal and our daughter simply loves this brand. We use this so much that we needed to buy it on Amazon as it is at least 1 dollar cheaper here.
customer_reviews.author: Anton LoG

customer_reviews.title: good taste
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves the taste of this cereal. It comes in good packaging which can be opened and sealed until next use. We put some water in the power and maybe mix a puree or something in it so the baby likes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. John

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loves it and I love that it's organic and has added vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my toddler this ever since he started on solids. He absolutely loves it and I love that it's organic and has added vitamins. Rice cereal gives nothing to infants, I would completely recommend using this as a first food.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great consistent product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't irritate our daughters stomach and we use a lot of this product. Wish it where able to be purchased unfortified as she doesn't need all the extra vitamins and iron in this but otherwise happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this cereal at the store and it agreed very well with my sons stomach. Amazon offered a deal I couldn't pass up on a 6 pack of this cereal. My son gets it twice a day and I mix fruit in it to add a little extra flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W

customer_reviews.title: My baby doesn't like the taste ... waste for us..
customer_reviews.text: My baby doesn't like the taste ... waste for us..
customer_reviews.author: Sekhar Gupta

customer_reviews.title: My LO (8months) love it.
customer_reviews.text: My LO (8months) love it ..! its his favorite food for breakfast and dinner...too bad cannot find it in my country
customer_reviews.author: hala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes this cereal the best of the oatmeal cereals we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: MJL44

customer_reviews.title: Mmm mmm good
customer_reviews.text: Our little loves this cereal and we mix in a jar of prunes to keep everything moving. Our 8 month old makes mmm sounds with each spoonful.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves it, has been eating it since 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff it has a good flavor and a nice texture
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Chernack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it since our baby girl's 7 months age.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the price! Love this cereal!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this cereal and now this was the best deal! $2 each! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Pathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My twins love this oatmeal cereal. They are 19 months now and I mix this into their morning fruit and greek yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne1480

customer_reviews.title: Give your little one a great head start on good nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to use rice. This is a perfect alternative. Falls in line with anti-inflammatory diets.
customer_reviews.author: Caera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My twins loved it. They had no issues with digestion from this product
customer_reviews.author: kylie wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this stuff!!! I would buy this over rice cereal any day.
customer_reviews.author: haydene

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: So glad they are making organic items now. Go gerber, go!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best organic oatmeal. Mix some yogurt, banana and sweet fruits and perfect breakfast for your little one
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sargent

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this and a fast an easy food when ur on the go
customer_reviews.author: sai

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and when she isn't getting breast milk ...
customer_reviews.text: She loves it and when she isn't getting breast milk from her mother it makes her really ease into the formula having oatmeal in the bottle
customer_reviews.author: IAmMicYoung

customer_reviews.title: Great baby cereal.
customer_reviews.text: We've been very happe with this. My child likes the cereal and the price is much cheaper than the grocery store when we use subscribe and save. I also like that the packaging is resealable and keeps moisture out, unlike other organic cereals that come in cardboard containers. Its nice to get the 6 pack so we don't have to worry about shopping often and its much less gross than the baby rice cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best baby oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this cereal. I started her on rice cereal, but when I read the Consumer's Report article about the levels of arsenic in rice cereal, I quickly switched her to this. I have also given her the Earth's Best brand oatmeal, but I think the Gerber has a better texture -- the Earth's Best seems more mushy -- at least for my little girl. And the Amazon price on this is less expensive than at my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Babina

customer_reviews.title: the best thing about this is having it delivered to my door by amazon prime so I don't have to leave the house to get it
customer_reviews.text: It's oatmeal. It's not exciting. It mixes well with pureed foods, so I made a lot of pureed fruit and oatmeal breakfasts for my kid before she decided eating off a spoon is for suckers and refused all spoon fed meals. It's also useful as a thickener when you are making pureed meats and veggies and go a step too far from purree to liquified. Now she can eat grownup oatmeal so I don't need this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Reb

customer_reviews.title: better for your baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby has gone through about half of the 6 pack in just a couple of months. This is the original sealed product and is the preferred cereal over the now debatable rice version. If you don't believe me, Google it so you can decide for yourself. My baby will not be getting rice cereal anytime soon. Oatmeal is far better for your child anyway.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: the product is very good I have been buying used
customer_reviews.text: Dear, the product is very good I have been buying used, thank you for your enthusiastic service, I would be happy to get your help, will focus on these products. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: nieyafang

customer_reviews.title: Great product, we feed it to our baby \ toddler every evening
customer_reviews.text: We have fed our son since about 6months to 2+ years old in the evening after dinner but before bed, we mix this with whole milk. He seems to sleep better though the night having a cereal like this in the evenings with whole milk mixed with it. We intended on using this same product with our daughter once she hits 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Add to formula
customer_reviews.text: We put a tablespoon of this in his formula bottle to beef up his nutrition. Gives him a bit of fiber! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Earl Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great cereal. Of Gerber's products
customer_reviews.text: Great cereal. Of Gerber's products, we only use the organic ones and this cereal is a good one. We use it when making milk and breakfast smoothies for our 2 year old. The container is very handy as well. We LOVE the container. lol. We actually keep them and fill them with the other cereals we use when we swap them out. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: thank you very much
customer_reviews.text: Baby haven't tried, but the packing is good, looked like, Packing also quite good, is the freight is a bit slow, anyway thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: cen qi

customer_reviews.title: Yummy :)
customer_reviews.text: My kid and dog both love it. I add it to grated fruits or smoothies or just with milk and it gets eaten extremely well :)
customer_reviews.author: MR A.

customer_reviews.title: A little grainier/thicker than the Earth's best brand. Less expensive generally
customer_reviews.text: A little grainier/thicker than the Earth's best brand. Less expensive generally, though. Overall good product for the price and I like the packaging. Really keeps the cereal fresh and can wash & re-use.
customer_reviews.author: mama of 3

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Earths Best Organic oatmeal, much thinner consistency
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Widerberg

customer_reviews.title: Very good. My daughter has been eating this oatmeal for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good. My daughter has been eating this oatmeal for breakfast since she was 4 months old. She is 13 months now, we still feed her this every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, healthy and well priced! Would recommend to anyone I know. Keeps babies bowels moving better through solid transion.
customer_reviews.author: Mkel

customer_reviews.title: Good for your Babies
customer_reviews.text: Is a good product with a good taste for your babies. I recommend 100% for every baby starting to eat
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: This is the only new food I introduced to my 7 month old baby in the past 2-3 days and she's never had a rash like this before
customer_reviews.text: Allergic reaction: rash on baby's chin and bottom. I have read from other reviews that it might be because of soy and milk ingredients even though these are not listed on the label. This is the only new food I introduced to my 7 month old baby in the past 2-3 days and she's never had a rash like this before. It's good the grandma suggested to look at her food as a possible cause.
customer_reviews.author: Tani

customer_reviews.title: are very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Many of our mother bought together these rice cereal, high number, but this is not fresh rice cereal hair goods, get deft expired, we should throw the baby eat! For those of you not freshly made ​​goods to us, are very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: xiaobo

customer_reviews.title: terrific
customer_reviews.text: I love the added vitamins, especially the iron! The container shape, with the flip lid, is an extra bonus....makes traveling with it so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn CM

product_meta.title: Gerber Organic Single-Grain Oatmeal Baby Cereal, 8 Ounces (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Oatmeal Baby Cereal| *:Baby CerealWhen your baby is ready to start solids, try Gerber Organic Oatmeal cereal. It also has iron to help support learning ability as well as Calcium, Vitamins C and 6 B Vitamins for healthy growth.
feature_bullets: SINGLE GRAIN CEREAL: This single grain oatmeal cereal features Vitamins C, E, Zinc & 6 B vitamins for healthy development, plus calcium for healthy bones & teeth. No artificial colors or flavors.

SOLID STARTER: Single-grain infant cereals are an ideal first solid food to check for food sensitivities & help develop baby's eating skills. Just 2 servings meets 90% of your baby's daily iron needs.
PEDIATRICIAN RECOMMENDED: Gerber Cereal is the #1 pediatrician-recommended brand for infant cereals among pediatricians who recommend infant cereal.
GERBER GOODNESS: Our foods start with whole ingredients like real fruits, veggies, & grains to help nourish your baby right from the start, from infant formula to baby food to snacks & toddler food.
NUTRITION FOR GROWING: Like your baby, we're always growing & learning. More than ever we're committed to being your partner in parenthood with quality ingredients, nutritious food & expert guidance.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
